para:
gps_utc_offset is used to override the built-in table of offsets of the offset between GPS time and UTC time. This chipset reports only GPS time to the host and relies on software to know every time an adjustment is made. Since GPS time offsets can change without a new version of GPSBabel is released, those that care about total accuracy can override it.
gpsbabel -i skytraq.bin,gps_utc_offset=15 -f filename.bin
Indicates that GPS is ahead of UTC by fifteen seconds, as was the case in 2009.
Consult formal explanation of GPS time vs. UTC time if you're into that.
